Class.name: xobw.error.DialogError
Class.Description:
Class for errors associated with DIALOG file (#.84) entries and used by the HWSC error processing sub-system

The Kernel API EZBLD^DIALOG should be used to produce the 'text' property value and
the ien of the DIALOIG file entry should be the 'code' property value.

Method.name: forceError
Method.Description:
Force an error to occur passing in DIALOG information to be used in $$EZBLD^DIALOG(...)
    Parameter:
  • dialogInfo
    • Piece #1: DIALOG IEN
    • Piece #2: Parameter #1 for EZBLD^DIALOG
    • Piece #3: Parameter #2 for EZBLD^DIALOG
    • Piece #n+1: Parameter #n for EZBLD^DIALOG

Restricted Use: This method is currently for HWSC use only.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: set ..errorType=..#ERRORTYPE set ..code=dialogCode set x=errorMessage for do ..text.Insert($extract(x,1,70)) set x=$extract(x,71,9999) quit:x="" quit $$$OK
